supplier_of: iron, special grade and pig iron | artistic cast iron work | casting of special and high-grade steels | precision casting | artistic and decorative foundry products
information: The company FONDERIE RENOUARD, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1994, which operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron industry. It also operates in the Artistic cast iron work, Casting of special and high-grade steels, precision casting, and artistic and decorative foundry products industries. It is based in Heric, France.
keywords: Iron, special grade and pig iron, Artistic cast iron work, Casting of special and high-grade steels, precision casting, artistic and decorative foundry products
